text: TSG 1899 Hoffenheim Frauen is the women's football section of German club TSG 1899 Hoffenheim, based in Hoffenheim, a village of Sinsheim municipality, Baden-Württemberg, inside the Rhine-Neckar. The team currently plays in the Frauen-Bundesliga, the highest level of women's football in Germany. ==History== The team started playing in 2007 and rushed through the lower leagues.
